## 1、【Window】—>【Preferences】

![在这里插入图片描述](https://img-blog.csdnimg.cn/20210301162702348.png?x-oss-process=image/watermark,type_ZmFuZ3poZW5naGVpdGk,shadow_10,text_aHR0cHM6Ly9ibG9nLmNzZG4ubmV0L3FxXzQzNjE5NDYx,size_16,color_FFFFFF,t_70)

## 2、【Server】—>【Runtime Environments】—>【Add】

![在这里插入图片描述](https://img-blog.csdnimg.cn/20210301162911339.png?x-oss-process=image/watermark,type_ZmFuZ3poZW5naGVpdGk,shadow_10,text_aHR0cHM6Ly9ibG9nLmNzZG4ubmV0L3FxXzQzNjE5NDYx,size_16,color_FFFFFF,t_70)
`选择对应版本的Tomcat`

## 3、【Apache Tomcat v`X.x`】—>【Next】

![在这里插入图片描述](https://img-blog.csdnimg.cn/20210301163247972.png?x-oss-process=image/watermark,type_ZmFuZ3poZW5naGVpdGk,shadow_10,text_aHR0cHM6Ly9ibG9nLmNzZG4ubmV0L3FxXzQzNjE5NDYx,size_16,color_FFFFFF,t_70)

## 4、【Browse】------>选择Tomcat安装位置（根目录）

![在这里插入图片描述](https://img-blog.csdnimg.cn/20210301163635557.png?x-oss-process=image/watermark,type_ZmFuZ3poZW5naGVpdGk,shadow_10,text_aHR0cHM6Ly9ibG9nLmNzZG4ubmV0L3FxXzQzNjE5NDYx,size_16,color_FFFFFF,t_70)

## 5、Servers----->双击Tomcat vX.x Server at localhost...

![在这里插入图片描述](https://img-blog.csdnimg.cn/20210301164641723.png?x-oss-process=image/watermark,type_ZmFuZ3poZW5naGVpdGk,shadow_10,text_aHR0cHM6Ly9ibG9nLmNzZG4ubmV0L3FxXzQzNjE5NDYx,size_16,color_FFFFFF,t_70)

## 6、选择`Use Tomcat installation`，并将【Deploy path】文本框内容修改为`webapps`

![在这里插入图片描述](https://img-blog.csdnimg.cn/20210301164349796.png?x-oss-process=image/watermark,type_ZmFuZ3poZW5naGVpdGk,shadow_10,text_aHR0cHM6Ly9ibG9nLmNzZG4ubmV0L3FxXzQzNjE5NDYx,size_16,color_FFFFFF,t_70)

## 7、启动Tomcat----->ok

![在这里插入图片描述](https://img-blog.csdnimg.cn/20210301164823231.png?x-oss-process=image/watermark,type_ZmFuZ3poZW5naGVpdGk,shadow_10,text_aHR0cHM6Ly9ibG9nLmNzZG4ubmV0L3FxXzQzNjE5NDYx,size_16,color_FFFFFF,t_70)
